a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Mean income or expenditure per day: 2011 vs 2017 international-$, 2019
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform; Population - UN (2022)
Note: This data relates to either disposable income or expenditure per capita (exact definitions vary).
